baseline_groups.claim_summary: Elasticity of climate damages wrt temperature (damage exponent d2 in power-law damage function). OLS of log(damages) on log(temperature) using Howard & Sterner (2017) meta-analysis data.
baseline_groups.notes: Single regression from Table 1. Paper is primarily structural/calibration; this OLS is used to estimate damage function parameters.

global_notes: No changes to baseline group assignments relative to the surface. G1 is the sole baseline group.
